description.value:
Trigger The bomb is Activated, which requires 3 actions

Effect The bomb releases a smoky cloud of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Blackfinger Blight] in a 20-foot radius. Creatures within the smoke are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] from other creatures.

Any creature that starts its turn in the smoke must roll a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32|name:Blackfinger Blight|traits:contact,virulent] saving throw to avoid being afflicted by blackfinger blight poison.

The cloud remains for 1 minute or until dispersed by strong winds.

hp.details: to ruin the nozzle (making it impossible to disable, in which case the only way to disarm the bomb is to destroy both its tanks); Tank Hardness 15; Tank HP 80 (BT 40) to destroy one of the tanks (both tanks must be destroyed to disarm the bomb

stealth.details: The bomb uses Oggvurm's initiative roll as its Stealth roll

details.description: A clockwork bomb releases gouts of poisonous smoke. The smoke issues forth from a single nozzle attached to two tanks of pressurized poison
details.disable: Three @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Disable a Latch|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disable Device]{Disable a Device} to disable the latches that lock the nozzle in place, then one @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Turn Off Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) check to Disable a Device to turn off the nozzle; DCs decrease by 2 if Oggvurm is immobilized, paralyzed, unconscious, or dead
details.reset: The trap issues smoke for 3 minutes before its tanks run dry. The tanks must be replaced before the bomb can be reactivated.
details.routine: (1 action) On its turn, the bomb spews forth a smoky gout of airborne @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Blackfinger Blight] poison. The cloud fills a 20-foot radius, or a 10-foot radius if only one tank remains intact. If the bomb is already in the center of a blackfinger blight cloud, the radius of that cloud increases by 20 feet (or 10 feet, if only one tank remains intact) instead.
